name: Save Them (itch) (MiniReap)
description:
Made in 4ish days for the 2nd Nokia 3310 Jam.

More of a Walking Sim than game, but I had fun making it and hope you find a little enjoyment out of it.

The point of this game is to make you think more about the implications of what happens in it than what is shown.

Have Fun. :)
